A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not the Luke Skywalker I grew up with.  Luke's actions in this movie are not true to the character.  Also\, my favorite new trilogy character\, Po Dameron\, acts like an irrational hothead throughout this movie.  Only the female characters are allowed to act rationally or heroically.  Leia flies through space like Mary Poppins.  So many plot holes.  This is the worst thing to happen to Star Wars since Jar Jar Binks.
